writer.name: 达纳·亚当·夏皮罗 Dana Adam Shapiro

director.name: 达纳·亚当·夏皮罗 Dana Adam Shapiro

this_title: Better Angels: The Gospel According To Tammy Faye
trans_title: 更好的天使:塔米·菲伊的福音
introduction: As told by her family, friends, and enemies, the meteoric rise, scandalous fall, and unlikely resurrection of Tammy Faye, the “First Lady of the Electric Church,” poses an increasingly relevant question: How did we get the story so wrong?
chinese_title: 更好的天使:塔米·菲伊的福音
foreign_title: Better Angels: The Gospel According To Tammy Faye
